name: Prathyuu
greetingText: I really like calling you Bluu btw! 😄
wishText: Chaala mandi birthday wishes cheptharu... “Happy Birthday, enjoy your day!” ani. But naadi konchem vere la undali anipinchindi… Not the loudest, not the most perfect but the one you might actually remember. May every little moment today bring peace to your heart and smile 😄 to your face. Stay Soft, Stay strong my world is better with you in it ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: 🎈 So Happy Birthday, Prathyusha… Smile chese every moment… let it be real. And this small message… May it not be the best, but definitely the most honest one you receive today.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
